comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A Dr. David B. Johnson was president of the Winthrop Normal and Industrial College of South Carolina and standing for president of the National Education Association in August 1915. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85058396/1915-08-20/ed-... and elected chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn86069395/1915-08-21/ed-...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Identification as Dr David Bancroft Johnson of Winthrop College confirmed by picture at www2.winthrop.edu/arts/page1/page1.html

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the interesting information about South Carolina educator Dr. David B. Johnson and for the confirming photograph.  We will add more information to the description.
